item.title: Retrieve hyperlinks via cli with shuttle
item.description: To infinity and beyond. -Buzz Lightyear I spend a lot of time at the terminal, either in vscode or a zsh shell. Two apps I use often are tldr and cht.sh because: I don’t remember the bookmarks that I have. I have too many bookmarks. While tldr and cht.sh are handy for retrieving public info, I needed a similar utility for work. Our tech stack has a lot of astronomy jargon e.
